attributes.action: To change the age of Widow's Pension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the 16th of November 2009, My Father Duncan Adams Passed Away Suddenly at the young age of 40,

My Mum & Dad Never had life insurence for him as he was a Diabetic and it was to much money for them,

Im Starting this petition up because my Mum is to YOUNG to get a Widows Pension, You Have to Be 45 & Older to get Widows Pension,

My Mum had been with my Dad for 24 YEARS! and 20 of those they were MARRIED! but she is NOT ALOUD a Widows Pension??

To Me This Is wrong! You Should Be Eligable For A Widows Pension Whatever The Age!

The Only Way it Should Be Taken Away From You is if You Re-Marry - Which i Think is Fair.

There Should Not Be an Age Limit on Widows!
